pageProps.title: Decision-making
pageProps.content:
### 1. Assumptions
What assumptions have we made?

Are our assumptions accurate?

### 2. Opportunity costs
If we choose one option, what are the opportunity costs?

### 3. Reality check
Do we hear what we want to hear?

What are we ignoring?

What's the worst thing that could happen?

See also [Guide to Decision Making: Getting it More Right than Wrong](https://www.amazon.com/Guide-Decision-Making-Getting-Right/dp/1118185358)
